attributes.action: Petition against recent Fee changes proposal on various Visa categories from April 2012
attributes.additional_details:
Hello,

This petiition is against recently proposed changes under  different visa categories fees which can be viewed here .

http://www.ukba.homeoffice.gov.uk/sitecontent/documents/news/wms-fees-feb-2012.pdf

This practice needs to be stopped and concerns should be raise through this petition to aware the correct athourties.


06-Apr-10 22-Dec-10 06-Apr-12 01/04/2012(Proposed)
Tier 1 visa - main applicant 840 850 1000 1500 79%
Tier 1 visa dependant 129 250 500 750 481%
Tier 1 visa - main applicant PEO 1095 1150 1300 1800 64%
Tier 1 visa dependant PEO 154 300 650 900 484%
